title: Portable Sound, Powerful Deal: Blast 20% Off in Savings on the Latest JBL Flip 7 Speaker
description: With Walmart Deals of the Day, you can also score the Vizio 65-inch 4K-Series TV for $80 off and the Beats Solo 4 headphones for $70 less.
content:
Some no-brainer tech upgrades just dropped in price at Walmart. The Vizio 65-inch 4K-Series TV is now $80 off and ready for your weekend binge with low input lag and decent color that holds up great for casual shows or gaming. The Beats Solo 4 knock $70 off the price while giving you hands-free Siri, wired or wireless listening, and punchy sound that’s easy to enjoy all day. And the JBL Flip 7, now 20% off, is the rugged, go-anywhere speaker that sounds better than it has any right to at this size.

If these deals didn't catch your eye, take some time to check out the ones we found on and .

After a budget-friendly 4K TV in the 65-inch range? Then point your eyes toward this Vizio 4K-Series with an $80 price cut. With decent picture quality, it handles SDR colors fairly accurately and has impressively low input lag, which makes it surprisingly responsive for gaming. Our expert, , rated it "Good" in for its brilliant performance at this particular price point. It's a reliable option for basic use, though its dim display and limited color range mean it's best for casual viewing rather than cinematic experiences.

“With the signature Beats sound, fairly long battery life, and hands-free Siri, the Beats Solo 4 headphones are an evolution of a mostly successful formula,” says our audio expert, , who rated them “Good” in . The physical buttons on the earcups are straightforward and let you skip tracks without fumbling around with your phone. You can listen in wired mode over USB-C or 3.5mm, so battery life isn’t a worry. And if you have an Apple device, hands-free Siri access makes tasks like texting or adjusting volume feel effortless. Overall, they’re a choice for daily listening and, at a $70 discount, an easier option to consider.

The latest JBL Flip 7 is super portable, currently available for a 20% discount, and handles drops and pool splashes like a champ. As tester put it, “It's designed to be used on the move and sounds good for its size.” He gave it a Good rating in , and it’s a solid pick. The bass hits hard enough for casual listening, and the battery easily lasts through a long hangout or hike. Want more juice? Flip on Playtime Boost to stretch the runtime. It syncs effortlessly with other JBL speakers using Auracast too.

There are even today. So go ahead and save now!
summary: The latest JBL Flip 7 speaker, now 20% off at Walmart, has been priced 20% lower than the previous 20%. The Vizio 65-inch 4K-Series TV is now $80 off, with low input lag and decent color, making it great for casual shows or gaming. The Beats Solo 4 headphones are also discounted at $70, offering hands-free Siri, wired or wireless listening, and punchy sound that is easy to enjoy all day. The JBL flip 7 is portable, capable of handling drops and pool splashes, and can sync with other JBL speakers using Auracast.
shortSummary: Walton's latest JBL Flip 7 Speaker, Beats Solo 4 headphones, Vizio 65-inch 4K-Series TV, and JBL Fl Flip 7 portable speakers are all 20% off, offering excellent portable sound and hands-free Siri integration.
